WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 26 JUL
   BY M/ RAMFORM TETHYS TOWING 12 600 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-49.47S 039-51.33W, 21-49.51S 039-37.02W,
   22-02.41S 039-37.06W, 22-02.41S 039-38.14W,
   22-11.45S 039-38.14W, 22-11.43S 039-50.39W,
   22-10.25S 039-50.39W, 22-10.25S 039-57.46W,
   22-01.14S 039-57.36W, 22-01.14S 039-54.00W,
   21-55.31S 039-53.58W, 21-53.01S 039-59.31W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1803/22.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 270001Z JUL 22.
